candidate.polish_study: A2 level, prepared for a month

reports.queue_and_process_notes: Stood in queue for 7 hours; people wait up to 12-24 hours on buses, worse by car.

next_steps.promised_action: Will call or send email in 1.5-2 months

reports.tips_and_notes: Answer questions extensively and confidently to reduce further questions; arrive early for queue; come a day early for immersion to loosen up the language.

reports.queue_and_process_notes: Registration via email, interview after three weeks; quick process as one of the first after opening.

next_steps.promised_action: Add documents from work, study, or apartment to the case (not mandatory but important).

segments.label: report
segments.rationale: Describes the document submission process for children's Karta Polaka applications in Gdansk, including details on personnel, timing, and required documents.

mentioned: parents' passport copies (last two pages and registration)

reports.queue_and_process_notes: Submitted for 2 children in presence of second parent; completed in 30 minutes instead of allocated 2 hours; all per list; no marriage certificate needed as surname unchanged.

next_steps.promised_action: Expect decision no earlier than 2-3 months.

reports.tips_and_notes: Passport copies must include border crossing stamp; Emilia remade copies of two spreads; parents' passports need only last two pages and registration.

segments.label: report
segments.rationale: Entire text describes additional documents presented and an interview question about Polish cultural artifacts at home, continuing a Karta Polaka report.

reports.tips_and_notes: Additional documents including family photos, genealogy tree, and invitations were presented and noted by the examiner; some were taken.

segments.label: report
segments.rationale: The entire message describes a personal experience with the KP document submission process in ≈Å√≥d≈∫, including procedural details and future steps.

mentioned: full package of documents for children based on mother's KP

reports.queue_and_process_notes: Submission without appointment on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays at window 8; staff indifferent to documents; issued 2 forms for Polish address/phone and document list in Polish; originals verified but no case number provided.

next_steps.promised_action: Call within 30 days to invite to commission (parents attend for children aged 5 months and 3 years); after commission, decision (dyatsyzja) mailed to Polish address; if positive, third trip to ≈Å√≥d≈∫ for plastic card pickup.

reports.tips_and_notes: Provide Polish address and phone (Belarusian +375 not accepted); describe documents in Polish on form; make copies of all documents including sworn translations before submitting originals.
